questions.question: Which of the following sentences correctly describes the difference between multiplexing and diversity?

answers.a: Diversity increases data rate by transmitting multiple data streams simultaneously.
answers.b: Multiplexing improves reliability by using multiple antennas to mitigate fading effects.
answers.c: Diversity enhances reliability through spatial, temporal, or frequency techniques.
answers.d: Multiplexing mitigates fading effects by utilizing independent fading paths between antennas.

questions.question: What happens to the number of SISO channels when antennas are grouped for diversity?
